alert.note: Alert for Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 07 at 6:16AM AKDT until October 08 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM AKDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Northern and Interior Seward Peninsula. * WHEN...Until 4 AM AKDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Low lying areas could flood causing damage to fish or hunting camps along the coast. Significant erosion is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels are expected to rise 3 to 4 feet above normal high tide line. The highest water levels are expected this afternoon, with water levels falling late tonight. Strong southwest winds will turn west and decrease this afternoon.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
